title: Referee Jaco Peyper not considered for World Cup semi-finals as Nigel Owens handed England game
text:
Nigel Owens has been appointed referee for England’s World Cup semi-final clash against New Zealand in Yokohama on Saturday, with Jérôme Garcès overseeing Wales’s clash against South Africa the following day.

But there is no place for Jaco Peyper in the semis. World Rugby said the match officials selection committee did not consider the South African in the wake of his controversial ‘selfie’ with a group of Welsh supporters following Wales’s quarter-final victory against France in Oita last weekend.

Peyper was photographed jokingly re-enacting the elbow to the head for which he sent...
description: Nigel Owens has been appointed referee for England’s World Cup semi-final clash against New Zealand in Yokohama on Saturday, with Jérôme Garcès overseeing Wales’s clash against South Africa the following day.
